review.title: “Very satisfying, unique and indefinitely sustainable.”
review.pros: Pros – Wealth creation made easy for business minded people.
review.cons: Cons – there are no downsides working with eplus.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Spread very fast to other African Countries.

review.title: “Generally knowlegable people in the support much more than other companies. Good relationship between individuals.”
review.pros: Pros – Management is very empowering. Not Micro-managing at all. Relaxed environment. Food provided quite often. Great benefits. Likes to promote within. Great pay for position - Higher than competitors. A good feeling of job security- No random layoffs that I know of.
review.cons: Cons – Communication from the top down could be improved.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Keep up the good work! Much better than my last job.I am not as familiar with many members of upper management.

review.title: “Generally good employer that gradually weakens and does not seem to return to good ol' days”
review.pros: Pros – good culture and communication among employees, but senior management does no communicate openly and often decisions are top-down from HQ in the netherlands. These decisions are often not in best interest of national and regional perspective.Good benefits in general, but huge cost pressure had negative impact on overall climate
review.cons: Cons – No clear promotion scheme nor any development paths for talented people. More of a "yes, yes" attitude and open communication is not enforced.Culture seems to be more and more based on political tactics than meritocracy.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – If possible be stronger with own decisions and not just act as puppet of group's HQ. Enforce stronger communication from senior management to employees and give clear, open feedback.
